title: Panthers close to sold, Joe vs. Lamar, more with Jason La Canfora (Football 05/15)
description:
CBS Sports NFL Insider Jason La Canfora joins Will Brinson to break down the latest happenings around the league, including the Panthers upcoming sale and what it means for the front office and coaching staff, the latest on the Matt Patricia front, the battle between Lamar Jackson and Joe Flacco that's happening in Baltimore, the news of SCOTUS repealing the federal gambling ban, if the Chargers are the team to beat in the AFC West and more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
